name: SAVE CHAKA
description: Save Chaka is a 3D first-person RPG. It is about the CandyFantasyWorld being attacked by an inexplicable dark force. People in the kingdom are controlled by the dark force and become monsters. The princess is also imprisoned. As the protagonist, you come here. It seems that you have some connection with the princess. You are carrying the task of saving the princess, and you are embarking on an adventure.
